equation.expression: \mathbb{E}\left[\sum_{n=1}^N (V_0^*(s_0) - V_0^{\pi^n}(s_0))\right]\lesssim \beta\mathbb{E}\left[\sum_{h=0}^{H-1}\sqrt N \sqrt{\sum_{n=1}^N\phi(s_h^n,a_h^n)^\top (\Lambda_h^n)^{-1}\phi(s_h^n,a_h^n)} \right] +\delta NH \lesssim \widetilde O (H^2 d^{1.5}\sqrt N)
